chapter.heading: OTHER TYPES OF CONTRACTS USED FOR PROCUREMENTS FOR PARTICULAR PURPOSES

section.heading: Leasing of commercial vehicles and equipment

content.p: The Secretary of Defense may use leasing in the acquisition of commercial vehicles and equipment whenever the Secretary determines that such leasing is practicable and efficient.

section.sourceCredit: (Added and amended Pub. L. 116–283, div. A, title XVIII, § 1825(a), (k), Jan. 1, 2021, 134 Stat. 4206, 4208.)
